danaus

Class Debugger

  • java.lang.Object
    • danaus.Debugger

  • public class Debugger
extends java.lang.Object
    A debugging tool shed, Debugger has many useful debugging tools that can help log a program, check for null parameters, etc.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean DEBUG_ENABLED
      Debugging on-off switches.
      static boolean ERROR_ENABLED 
      static boolean NULL_CHECK_ENABLED
      NULL_CHECK checks for null iff NULL_CHECK_ENABLED is true.
      static boolean WARNING_ENABLED 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Debugger() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void DEBUG(java.lang.String message)
      If DEBUG_ENABLED is true, prints a message logged with the current time.
      static void ERROR(java.lang.String message)
      If ERROR_ENABLED is true, print message logged with the current time.
      static void NULL_CHECK(java.lang.Object obj, java.lang.String message)
      If NULL_CHECK_ENABLED is true and obj is null, print message and throw a NullPointerException.
      static void WARNING(java.lang.String message)
      If WARNING_ENABLED is true, print message logged with the current time.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • DEBUG_ENABLED

        public static boolean DEBUG_ENABLED
        Debugging on-off switches. When an enable is set to to true, it's corresponding debugging function will produce output. Otherwise, it will not. For example, if DEBUG_ENABLED is true, the DEBUG method will print to standard output. If DEBUG_ENABLES is false, DEBUG does nothing.

      • WARNING_ENABLED

        public static boolean WARNING_ENABLED

      • ERROR_ENABLED

        public static boolean ERROR_ENABLED

      • NULL_CHECK_ENABLED

        public static boolean NULL_CHECK_ENABLED
        NULL_CHECK checks for null iff NULL_CHECK_ENABLED is true.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Debugger

        public Debugger()

    • Method Detail

      • DEBUG

        public static void DEBUG(java.lang.String message)
        If DEBUG_ENABLED is true, prints a message logged with the current time.
        Parameters:
        message - A debug message.

      • WARNING

        public static void WARNING(java.lang.String message)
        If WARNING_ENABLED is true, print message logged with the current time.
        Parameters:
        message - A warning message.

      • ERROR

        public static void ERROR(java.lang.String message)
        If ERROR_ENABLED is true, print message logged with the current time.
        Parameters:
        message - An error message.

      • NULL_CHECK

        public static void NULL_CHECK(java.lang.Object obj,
              java.lang.String message)
        If NULL_CHECK_ENABLED is true and obj is null, print message and throw a NullPointerException.
        Parameters:
        obj - An object.
        message - An error message to produce if obj is null.
